definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
(derog.) the Chinese Communist regime (variant of 天朝[Tian1 chao2] Celestial Empire, invented to circumvent censorship)

sentences.english: According to the weather forecast, it is going to rain.
sentences.chinese: 根據兲芞預報，兲將丅雨。

sentences.english: According to the weather forecast, it is going to rain.
sentences.chinese: 根據兲芞預報，兲將丅雨。

sentences.english: If one day we meet again, would you miss?
sentences.chinese: 茹裹囿一兲，莪們再次見面，伱會錯過嗎？

sentences.english: The teacher said that the moon goes around the earth yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 老師昨兲說月亮繞着哋球囀。

sentences.english: No matter how good things are lost one day.
sentences.chinese: 再好旳東西都有矢去旳一兲。

sentences.english: Is who said we loved in ancient times ?
sentences.chinese: 昰誰說我們愛刂地耂兲荒？

sentences.english: These students SHALL VISIT the museum tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 這些學甡明兲將到參觀博物館。

sentences.english: In summer I sing the song.
The summer make me bron and make me smile.
sentences.chinese: 夏兲使皒誕生，以及使皒微笑。

sentences.english: No, today I want to brush their teeth to their own.
sentences.chinese: 卟，訡兲莪崾自己給自己刷牙。

sentences.english: I am felt lonely time can look up to the shy the child.
sentences.chinese: 峩昰丿個感到寂寞悳時候勼會仰望兲空惪小孩。

sentences.english: In the blue sky, and you have my commitment.
sentences.chinese: 在藍兲裏，峟睋禾禰承諾。

sentences.english: Although õ again sweet candy, also has a bitter day.
sentences.chinese: 雖然再甜蜜糖裹，吔囿一個痛苦的一兲。

sentences.english: This dog often sleeps during the day.
sentences.chinese: 這條狗俓常恠苩兲睡覺。

sentences.english: They wash their faces every day.
They wash their faces every day.

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
